UI

Class JavaFXUI

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.application.Application
      • UI.JavaFXUI

  • public class JavaFXUI
extends javafx.application.Application
    This class is the main interface and uses instances of the OrderHandler and StockHandler and their methods to display information from the relational database to users of the GUI.
    Author:
    hmapl
